Pre-Game Insights: The Milwaukee Brewers and Philadelphia Phillies meet on Wednesday with the three-game series tied 1-1.
The Brewers are 43-30 at home and 87-64 overall, ranking seventh in the NL in home runs with 169 total.
The Phillies have a 91-60 record overall and a 39-34 record on the road, with a 68-7 record in games where they have more hits than their opponents.
This will be the sixth time these teams meet this season, with the Phillies holding a 4-1 advantage in the season series.
